alert.note: Alert for Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 02 at 2:45AM MST until March 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest and western Texas. * WHEN...Until midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
